lead_paragraph: The New York City Ballet principal Maria Kowroski loves being a new mother to her son, Dylan. But conditioning herself for a comeback posed challenges.

headline.print_headline: From Ballerina to Mom, and Back Again
headline.main: A Ballerina’s Return From Maternity Leave

snippet: The New York City Ballet principal Maria Kowroski loves being a new mother to her son, Dylan. But conditioning herself for a comeback posed challenges.
abstract: New York City Ballet principal Maria Kowroski discusses difficulties she overcame to get back in form and onstage in months following birth of her first child.
